recipe.title: Celery Root and Potato Purée with Chervil (Céleri Rave en Purée)
ingredients: Equipment: a food mill or potato ricer
instructions: Peel potatoes and celery root. Cut into 1-inch chunks. Steam in a large steamer set over boiling water, covered, until very tender, 30 to 40 minutes.
Force through food mill into a bowl. Stir in cream, chervil, 3/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper. Season with additional salt.
